name: Counter

inputs.name: Increase
inputs.description: Add value to the origin number

inputs.name: Decrease
inputs.description: Deduct value from the origin number

inputs.name: Reset
inputs.description: Reset the counter to the From value

inputs.name: Step
inputs.description: The value to increase or decrease

inputs.name: From
inputs.description: The origin value to increase or decrease

inputs.name: To
inputs.description: The end value of the count

outputs.name: Current
outputs.description: The current output number after increasing or decreasing

description: Increase or decrease a certain value to/from an origin number.
